name: Naruto Shippuden
description: Naruto Shippuden was an anime series that ran from 2007 to 2017. In total 500 episodes of Naruto Shippuden were aired. With a total of 201 reported filler episodes, Naruto Shippuden has a moderate filler percentage of 40%.Set two-and-a-half years after the defection of Sasuke Uchiha, Shippuden continues where Naruto left off. Becoming increasingly powerful; Naruto will stop at nothing to protect his village, save his friend, and put an end to the evil organization known as the Akatsuki.

title: Three Minutes Between Life and Death
